title: Language Education Design to Enhance Cross-Cultural E-Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and elementary-level foreign language comprehension
context.additional_context: Utilizing simulation/VR-based e-learning content in smartphone-centric limited technological environments. Adaptive learning design considering cultural backgrounds required

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform language use scenarios in diverse cultural contexts through VR simulations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply the Cultural Adaptation Process (CAP) model to create self-assessment reports on their cultural preferences and e-learning strategies.
Learners can propose three or more language utilization strategies reflecting cultural differences in project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
